## UsePaginationReturnType.pageRange property

A range from 1 to the totalPage

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
readonly pageRange: number[];
```

## Example

If perPageSize is 10 and totalSize is 50:

```
console.log(pageRange) // [1, 2, 3, 4, 5]

```
